fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Storm a player's house each night. If they're attacking someone, you will be dealt the attack instead of their target, and you'll deal a Powerful attack to the attacker. If they're being attacked, you will be dealt the attack instead of them, but you won't counterattack.
- Put on a bulletproof night at vest, granting yourself Basic defense. You may only do this once.
